org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.unistrokeProcessor

Class UnistrokeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.unistrokeProcessor.UnistrokeUtils

  • public class UnistrokeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class MTDollarUtils, all calculations for the Gesture Recognizer Based on the Code from http://depts.washington.edu/aimgroup/proj/dollar/ http://www.openprocessing.org/visuals/?visualID=600
